item.title: 英伟达与英特尔的合作让英特尔少了一个重要部件
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）分析了上周英伟达（Nvidia）宣布将投资竞争对手芯片制造商英特尔（Intel），两家公司将在某些产品上进行合作的消息。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King analyzes last week’s announcement that Nvidia would invest in rival chipmaker Intel and the companies would combine on some products.】

item.title: 欧洲的 "中国梦 "结束了，波兰成了更大的客户
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注欧洲与中国经济关系的变化。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at Europe’s changed economic relationship with China. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 人工智能如何驱动全球投资模式
item.description: 近几个月来，美国经济新出现的一个令人担忧的问题是其增长对人工智能相关投资的依赖。今年上半年，涌入数据中心和芯片工厂的资本超过了消费，成为国内生产总值增长的驱动力。人工智能项目为今年预计增长不到 2% 的美国经济产出增加了整整一个百分点或更多。【原文：One emerging concern about the US economy in recent months has been its dependence on AI-related investment for growth. Capital pouring into data centers and chip plants in the first half of this year overtook consumption as a driver of GDP growth. AI projects are adding as much as a full percentage point or more to US economic output expected to expand by less than 2% this year.】

item.title: 中国人民银行未受美联储降息影响，政策走向取决于国内数据
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜表示，货币政策的任何变化都将主要以国内因素为导向，这表明美国联邦储备委员会的举动不会决定中国政府的利率决策。【原文：People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said any changes to monetary policy will be guided primarily by domestic factors, indicating moves made by the US Federal Reserve won’t determine Beijing’s interest-rate decisions.】

item.title: 增长缓慢的经济威胁定价完美的股票
item.description:
当经济陷入低增长模式时，股票回报率往往会下降。【原文：

Stock returns tend to fade when the economy is stuck in low-growth mode.

】

item.title: 据说意大利联合信贷银行已将 Generali 的持股比例降至 2% 左右
item.description: 作为此前宣布的从 Assicurazioni Generali SpA 撤资战略的一部分，UniCredit SpA 已将其在 Assicurazioni Generali SpA 的股份降至约 2%。【原文：UniCredit SpA has reduced its stake in Assicurazioni Generali SpA to around 2% as part of a previously announced divestment strategy from the insurer.】

item.title: 德国将授予萨博和诺斯罗普 12 亿欧元欧洲战斗机更新合同
item.description: 德国计划授予萨伯公司和诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司一份价值 12 亿欧元（14.1 亿美元）的合同，为其欧洲战斗机机队配备使用先进导弹探测和摧毁地面防空系统所需的设备。【原文：Germany plans to award Saab and Northrop Grumman a €1.2 billion ($1.41 billion) contract to fit its Eurofighter fleet with equipment needed to use advanced missiles to detect and destroy ground-based air defense systems.】

item.title: 台风可能导致全球最大规模上市延期
item.description: 紫金黄金国际股份有限公司（Zijin Gold International Co.）目前正在接受订单，准备在数月来全球最大的首次公开募股中募集 32 亿美元，但由于超强台风拉格萨的影响，该公司可能不得不推迟下周在香港的首次交易。【原文：Zijin Gold International Co., which is currently taking orders to raise $3.2 billion in the world’s biggest initial public offering in months, may have to delay its trading debut in Hong Kong next week because of super typhoon Ragasa.】

item.title: 关于美国与中国的 TikTok 协议，我们知道和不知道的事情
item.description: 经过一年多的谈判，中美两国即将达成协议，将社交媒体平台 TikTok 在美国的业务剥离给一个包括软件巨头甲骨文公司在内的财团。如果该协议最终敲定，将解决北京与华盛顿关系中的一个老大难问题，该问题已与更广泛的贸易谈判纠缠在一起。【原文：After more than a year of negotiations, the US and China are nearing an agreement to hive off the US operations of social media platform TikTok to a consortium that includes software giant Oracle Corp. If the deal is finalized, it would resolve a persistent issue in Beijing-Washington relations that has become entangled in broader talks over trade.】

item.title: MrBeast 谈他如何将 YouTube 的名气转化为娱乐帝国
item.description:
这位病毒视频大师现在有了一位首席执行官来控制兰博基尼的开支，并让他的 "爆款内容" 获得更广泛的传播。【原文：

The master of viral videos now has a CEO to rein in spending on Lambos—and give his “banger content” an even wider reach.

】

item.title: 在特朗普支持的交易中，TikTok 的算法将被甲骨文公司收购
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，根据一项正在成形的交易，甲骨文公司将重新创建美国版的TikTok算法，并为其提供安全保障。【原文：Oracle Corp. would recreate and provide security for a new US version of TikTok’s algorithm under a deal taking shape to sell the popular Chinese-owned app to a consortium of American investors, a White House official said, addressing a key concern raised by lawmakers in Washington.】

item.title: 特朗普的巴西威胁助力受人喜爱的支付平台受阻
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普总统对南美国家巴西发起进攻时，信用卡公司在与巴西竞争性支付系统的斗争中赢得了一个新的强大盟友。【原文：Credit card companies won a new and powerful ally in their fight against a competing payment system in Brazil when President Donald Trump went on the offensive against the South American country.】

item.title: 通胀飙升，瑞典央行面临利率困境
item.description: 本周，瑞典央行将面临一个艰难的抉择：一是降低借贷成本，以刺激停滞不前的经济；二是保持借贷成本稳定，以应对更快的通胀。【原文：Sweden’s central bank faces a tough choice this week between cutting borrowing costs to fire up a stalling economy and holding them steady to counter faster inflation.】

item.title: PAI 据称准备以 12 亿美元出售制药商 Ethypharm
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 PAI Partners 正在探讨出售法国制药商 Ethypharm 的事宜。【原文：Private equity firm PAI Partners is exploring a sale of French drugmaker Ethypharm, a specialist in pain and addiction treatment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称法国更多评级下调面临被迫出售债券风险
item.description: 据杰富瑞国际有限公司（Jefferies International Ltd.）称，法国主权评级再次下调可能会迫使一些投资者抛售所持有的法国债券，从而有可能加速因政治动荡和财政挑战而引发的抛售。【原文：Another sovereign downgrade for France could force some investors to offload their holdings of the country’s bonds, according to Jefferies International Ltd., risking accelerating a selloff sparked by political upheaval and fiscal challenges.】

item.title: 旧经济型能源股因廉价石油而跑赢大多数标普 500 指数股票
item.description: 科技股和人工智能相关股票理所应当地备受关注，但股票市场上另一个传统的乏味领域却在悄然崛起：炼油企业。【原文：For all the attention that tech and AI-related stocks — deservedly — get, there’s another traditionally boring pocket of the equity market that’s quietly been on a tear: oil refiners.】

item.title: 鲨鱼宝宝 "创造者 Pinkfong 寻求从首尔首次公开募股中筹资 5500 万美元
item.description: YouTube有史以来观看人数最多的视频 "鲨鱼宝宝 "背后的公司正在寻求通过在首尔首次公开募股筹集高达760亿韩元（5460万美元）的资金。【原文：The company behind “Baby Shark,” the most-watched YouTube video of all time, is seeking to raise as much as 76 billion won ($54.6 million) via an initial public offering in Seoul.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴试图吸引亚马逊上的品牌入驻其全球网站
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司正试图吸引亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）旗下的知名品牌入驻其全球电子商务网站阿里速卖通（AliExpress），加大力度在这家总部位于西雅图的公司的主场拓展业务。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is trying to attract established brand names on Amazon.com Inc. to its global e-commerce site AliExpress, stepping up efforts to expand its footprint on the Seattle-based firm’s home turf.】

item.title: 维多利亚地毯制造商寻求通过 2028 年债券交换削减债务
item.description: 英国地毯制造商 Victoria Plc 正寻求将其债务负担削减最多 7500 万欧元（8820 万美元），这是该公司依靠美国式债权人激进策略进行彻底改革的下一阶段。【原文：UK carpet manufacturer Victoria Plc is seeking to slash its debt load by up to €75 million ($88.2 million), the next stage in an overhaul that has relied on aggressive US-style creditor tactics.】

item.title: 摩根大通的马特伊卡认为欧洲股票将再次吸引人
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：After a period of consolidation, it may soon be time to add exposure to euro-area stocks again, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 港元以二十年来最快速度走强
item.description: 在强劲的股票流入和有利的货币市场条件的推动下，港元以二十多年来罕见的速度走强。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar has strengthened at a pace little seen in over two decades, buoyed by strong equity inflows and favorable money market conditions.】

item.title: 对大多数欧洲人来说，在家工作并不值得减少薪水
item.description: 据欧洲中央银行称，大多数欧洲人都不愿意接受大幅减薪来换取每天不去办公室上班。【原文：Most Europeans wouldn’t be willing to accept a large pay cut in exchange for not showing up to the office every day, according to the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 价值 200 亿美元的南非基金警告不要全面押注比特币
item.description: 南非 Sygnia 有限公司于今年 6 月开始发行比特币交易所交易基金，该公司表示将劝阻投资者不要将所有资产转入高风险的加密货币基金。【原文：South Africa’s Sygnia Ltd., which started a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund in June, says it will dissuade investors from switching all their assets into the high-risk crypto fund.】

item.title: 欧洲央行民调显示，欧洲购物者因美国关税而减少消费
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一项调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策加剧了经济前景的不确定性，欧元区消费者减少了支出，不再购买美国商品。【原文：Euro-zone consumers have reduced spending and shifted away from US goods as President Donald Trump’s tariffs stoke uncertainty about the economic outlook, according to a European Central Bank survey.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦计划发行多达 20 亿元人民币债券发展对华关系
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦主管经济发展的副总理表示，哈萨克斯坦计划今年筹集多达 20 亿美元的人民币债务，为与中国不断发展的贸易和投资关系提供资金。【原文：Kazakhstan plans to raise as much as $2 billion in renminbi debt this year to fund growing trade and investment ties with China, the deputy prime minister in charge of economic development said.】

item.title: 安哥拉石油日产量回升至百万桶大关以上
item.description: 安哥拉8月份的月均原油产量从两年多来首次低于100万桶/日的水平回升到100万桶/日以上。【原文：Angola’s average monthly crude output climbed back above a million barrels a day in August, recovering from dropping below that level for the first time in more than two years.】

item.title: Canal+ 旨在通过非洲赌注成为五大娱乐公司之一
item.description: Canal+ 首席执行官表示，Canal+ 已经实际控制了非洲最大的付费电视公司 MultiChoice Group Ltd.，并计划将合并后的实体打造成全球最大的媒体公司之一。【原文：Canal+ took effective control of Africa’s biggest PayTV firm, MultiChoice Group Ltd. and plans for the combined entity to be among the biggest media firms worldwide, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 吉姆-克莱默谈零售交易革命
item.description:
《疯狂理财》主持人眼中的世界

How the Mad Money Host Sees the World

】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-克莱默谈零售交易革命（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：吉姆-克莱默谈零售交易革命（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Jim Cramer on the Retail Trading Revolution (Podcast)】

item.title: 低价、空地和凉爽天气推动北欧数据中心蓬勃发展
item.description: 由于凉爽的天气和较低的电价吸引了更多的大型项目北上，北欧的电力公司将从欧洲数据中心的蓬勃发展中获得巨大收益。【原文：Nordic power companies stand to win big from Europe’s data-center boom, as cool weather and lower power prices entice more mega-projects northward.】
